name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Operations Engineer with 10+ years of experience in automation, incident response, and performance tuning, equipped with a robust technical skill set including **GCP**, **Linux**, **Windows**, **Python**, **Bash**, **PowerShell**, **Ansible**, **Puppet**, **Chef**, **Prometheus**, and **Cloud Monitoring**. Specializing in cloud infrastructure management and implementing effective disaster recovery strategies, I bring a proven ability to ensure system reliability and efficiency through comprehensive backup and performance optimization solutions. 

Demonstrated expertise in cloud storage management and IAM, coupled with a strong foundation in task management and documentation practices. Leveraging my background as a Full Stack Developer, I have delivered high-performance software solutions and led enterprise platform development. My passion for innovation ensures that every system I build not only meets compliance standards but also drives real-world impact in healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:

•	Implemented monitoring solutions utilizing **Prometheus** and **Cloud Monitoring** tools to provide real-time insights and incident response capabilities, improving system reliability by **25%**.
•	Designed comprehensive documentation practices for infrastructure and operational procedures, enhancing team collaboration and knowledge sharing.
•	Conducted performance tuning on servers and applications, reducing response times by up to **30%** through optimization of resource allocation and task management.

•	Implemented Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies to secure cloud environments, ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices.
•	Performed thorough incident response analysis, leading post-mortem reviews and developing strategies to mitigate future risks and improve resilience.
•	Supported cloud storage solutions, effectively managing data lifecycle and retention policies to optimize costs and enhance access speeds.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address performance bottlenecks, leveraging task management tools to track progress and deliver results consistently.
